structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIIIA. SOUTH FLORIDA CULTURAL CONSORTIUM

text.section:
Sec. 2-300.8. Prohibition on borrowing.
Without the express authorization of each of the participating counties, the Consortium may not borrow funds nor issue debt instruments; provided that nothing in the article shall prevent the Consortium from leasing equipment or paying for equipment under a lease-purchase or installment sale agreement, the term of which shall not exceed the remaining term of the interlocal agreement authorized hereby.
